modules.openedoo_eclass_module.database module¶

class modules.openedoo_eclass_module.database.Eclass(**kwargs)¶

Bases: flask_sqlalchemy.Model

Eclass database schema

Id integer:The Eclass id
Name varchar:The Eclass name
Course varchar:The course where Eclass belongs to
University varchar:
 The university where Eclass belongs to
Member text:The Eclass member
Admin text:The Eclass administrator
Privilege varchar:
 The Eclass privilege, public or private
Unique_code text:
 The Eclass unique code

modules.openedoo_eclass_module.error_handler module¶

API error_handler.

This module produces exception or error message the user is expecting, the better solution than using abort to signal errors for Invalid API usage.

exception modules.openedoo_eclass_module.error_handler.InvalidUsage(message, exception, status_code=None, payload=None)¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception
